member.name: M:DeMIPS.ProgramBlock.GetVariableByNameForced(System.String)
member.summary: Searches for variable in the pool of local variables. If it doesn't exist, create a new one, add it to the pool, and return it.

member.name: M:DeMIPS.UtilPreprocessor.PreprocessComments(System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Splits a lines into code and comment portions.
member.param: Character(s) that mark regions of comments.

member.name: M:DeMIPS.UtilPreprocessor.PreprocessWhiteSpace(System.String[])
member.summary: Reconstructs each line to include only one space between tokens.

member.name: M:DeMIPS.UtilGeneral.DecimalToHexadecimal(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a integer to a string by returning its hexadecimal value as a string. The form will be "0xHHHH".
member.returns: String containing hexadecimal verions of input.

member.name: M:DeMIPS.UtilGeneral.LoadTextFile(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the contents of a text file into an array of strings and returns it.
member.returns: Array of strings containting the text file.

member.summary: DeAssembly constructor. Setup Frontend and Backend.

member.name: M:DeMIPS.DeAssembly.DecompileAssembly(System.String[],System.Windows.Forms.TextBox)
member.summary: Decompiles source code in a given array. The result is placed into the TextBox that was passed.
member.param: TextBox that result will be copied to.

member.name: T:DeMIPS.ProgramChunkAssignment
member.summary: This stores an expression in the form of variable = expression, where variable and expression are objects.

member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: M:DeMIPS.DeAssemblyForm.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes GUI. If args[0] exists, it will be treated as a filename and the decompilation process will be started.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:DeMIPS.IFrontend
member.summary: Interface for the Frontend that will convert assembly to the intermediate format. The main purpose of this is preparation for supporting more than MIPS.

member.name: M:DeMIPS.FrontendMIPS.TranslateLine(System.String,DeMIPS.ProgramBlock)
member.summary: Translates a line of MIPS assembly into the intermediate format and returns the result.
member.param: ProgramBlock containing previously translated code and associated information

member.name: M:DeMIPS.FrontendMIPS.IsVariable(System.String)
member.summary: Tests if a given token of text is a variable name. In most cases, when this returns false, the possible variable is actually a constant.
member.returns: True if it is a variable.

member.name: M:DeMIPS.FrontendMIPS.Preprocess(System.String[])
member.summary: Processes source code by removing non-coding regions,cleaning non-uniform whitespace, removing spare characters. TODO: check for malformed input and labels existing on same line as keyword.

member.name: M:DeMIPS.FrontendMIPS.PreprocessByToken(System.String[])
member.summary: Cleans up tokens in source code. Tokens are defined by blocks of characters between spaces. Tokens will have tail ','s removed and space between tokens will be normalize to a single space.
member.param: Array of strings containing source code.
